special_text:
[+1]: Create an Idol token. [i](It's a colorless artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.”)[/i]
[0]: Until your next turn, Oko becomes a copy of another target nonland permanent, except he's still a planeswalker.
[-2]: Another target nonland permanent loses all abilities and becomes a colorless Eldrazi creature with base power and toughness 3/2.
[-6]: Gain control of target permanent. Any number of permanents you control become copies of that permanent.
